sect1.title: frei0r-plugins-&frei0r-version;

sect2.title: Installation of Frei0r-plugins
sect2.para: Install Frei0r by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir -vp build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -Wno-dev .. &&
make

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -DWITHOUT_OPENCV=TRUE: This option instructs the make procedure to disable building plugins dependent upon opencv.
-DWITHOUT_GAVL=TRUE: This option instructs the make procedure to disable building plugins dependent upon gavl.
